1: <pb/><t>Naq ke'elk eb' laj Israel aran Ejiipt,<f>[303]</f></t> <t>naq ki'elk li xjunkab'al laj Jakob sa' jalanil tenamit,</t>
2: <t>laj Judá kikanaak cho'q xloq'laj ochoch li Qaawa'</t> <t>ut laj Israel kiwank cho'q x'awab'ejihom.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Li palaw kiril ut ki'elelik,<f>[304]</f></t> <t>li nima' Jordán kiq'ajk chirix.<f>[305]</f></t>
4: <t>Eb' li tzuul ke'pisk'ok chanchaneb' li chib'aat,</t> <t>ut eb' li kok' b'ool chanchaneb' li karneer.</t>
5: <pb/><t>K'aru xak'ul, at palaw, naq yookat chi elelik,</t> <t>k'a'ut naq nakatq'ajk chawix, at Jordán?</t>
6: <t>K'a'ut naq nekexpisk'ok, ex tzuul,</t> <t>chanchanex wi' li chib'aat?</t> <t>Ut laa'ex kok' b'ool, k'a'ut naq nekex'eek'ank</t> <t>chanchanex wi' li karneer?</t>
7: <pb/><t>Chatsiksotq, at ruuchich'och', chiru li Qaawa',</t> <t>chiru li rilob'aal li xYos laj Jakob!</t>
8: <t>A'an naxjaltesi li saqoonak chi kaq'nab',</t> <t>ut li nimla pek nakanaak chi yu'amha'.<f>[306]</f></t>
